H0.text: who has the talismans in sailor moon s. Michiru Kaioh

H1.text: who has the talismans in sailor moon s. Hotaru Tomoe

H2.text: who has the talismans in sailor moon s. Chibiusa

H3.text: who has the talismans in sailor moon s. Haruka

A4.text: Sailor Neptune has the Deep Aqua Mirror, which always reveals the truth.

A5.text: Sailor Neptune lends the Deep Aqua Mirror to Chibiusa while she and the other Outer Soldiers are away.

A6.text: Sailor Chibi Moon is given the Golden Crystal, which she uses to call on the power of dreams.

A7.text: In the manga, Chibiusa is briefly entrusted with the Deep Aqua Mirror, Sailor Neptune's Talisman, and can use it to teleport to Neptune's location.
